1.name: The Big Heat
1.description: Tough cop Dave Bannion takes on a politically powerful crime syndicate.

2.name: From Here to Eternity
2.description: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.

3.name: Roman Holiday
3.description: A bored and sheltered princess escapes her guardians and falls in love with an American newsman in Rome.

4.name: Shane
4.description: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.

5.name: Hondo
5.description: Army despatch rider Hondo Lane discovers a woman and young son living in the midst of warring Apaches and becomes their protector.

6.name: Peter Pan
6.description: Wendy and her brothers are whisked away to the magical world of Neverland with the hero of their stories, Peter Pan.

7.name: Lili
7.description: An orphaned young woman becomes part of a puppet act and forms a relationship with the anti-social puppeteer.

8.name: Calamity Jane
8.description: The story of Calamity Jane, her saloon, and her romance with Wild Bill Hickok.

9.name: The War of the Worlds
9.description: A small town in California is attacked by Martians, beginning a worldwide invasion.

10.name: House of Wax
10.description: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

11.name: The Wild One
11.description: Two rival motorcycle gangs terrorize a small town after one of their leaders is thrown in jail.

12.name: Time Bomb
12.description: When a terrorist plants a bomb on board a train, the police call in an army bomb disposal expert to find, and dismantle it, but after it has been made safe, he has another shock in store.

13.name: Tôkyô monogatari
13.description: An old couple visit their children and grandchildren in the city; but the children have little time for them.

14.name: Gentlemen Prefer Blondes
14.description: Showgirls Lorelei Lee and Dorothy Shaw travel to Paris, pursued by a private detective hired by the suspicious father of Lorelei's fiancé, as well as a rich, enamored old man and many other doting admirers.

15.name: Le salaire de la peur
15.description: In a decrepit South American village, four men are hired to transport an urgent nitroglycerine shipment without the equipment that would make it safe.

16.name: Stalag 17
16.description: When two escaping American World War II prisoners are killed, the German P.O.W. camp barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

17.name: Pickup on South Street
17.description: A pickpocket unwittingly lifts a message destined for enemy agents and becomes a target for a Communist spy ring.

18.name: Beat the Devil
18.description: On their way to Africa are a group of rogues who hope to get rich there, and a seemingly innocent British couple. They meet and things happen...

19.name: Sommaren med Monika
19.description: A pair of teenagers meet one summer day, start a reckless affair and abandon their families to be with one another.

20.name: How to Marry a Millionaire
20.description: Three women set out to find eligible millionaires to marry, but find true love in the process.

21.name: The Beast from 20,000 Fathoms
21.description: A ferocious dinosaur awakened by an Arctic atomic test terrorizes the North Atlantic and, ultimately, New York City.

22.name: Niagara
22.description: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

23.name: The Robe
23.description: In the Roman province of Judea during the 1st century, Roman tribune Marcellus Gallio is ordered to crucify Jesus of Nazareth but is tormented by his guilty conscience afterwards.

24.name: Invaders from Mars
24.description: A young boy learns that space aliens are taking over the minds of earthlings.

25.name: Fear and Desire
25.description: Four soldiers trapped behind enemy lines must confront their fears and desires.

26.name: It Came from Outer Space
26.description: A spaceship from another world crashes in the Arizona desert and only an amateur stargazer and a schoolteacher suspect alien influence when the local townsfolk begin to act strangely.

27.name: Tumbleweed
27.description: When a wagon train is wiped-out by the Yaqui Indians, the surviving guide Jim Harvey is accused of desertion and cowardice but Jim escapes the town jail in search of the truth.

28.name: Les vacances de Monsieur Hulot
28.description: Monsieur Hulot comes to a beachside hotel for a vacation, where he accidentally (but good-naturedly) causes havoc.

29.name: The Hitch-Hiker
29.description: Two fishermen pick up a psychotic escaped convict who tells them that he intends to murder them when the ride is over.

30.name: Gunsmoke
30.description: A young gun slinger tries to help a rancher and his daughter, save their land and cattle from an evil, wealthy land owner.

31.name: Julius Caesar
31.description: The growing ambition of Julius Caesar is a source of major concern to his close friend Brutus. Cassius persuades him to participate in his plot to assassinate Caesar, but they have both sorely underestimated Mark Antony.

32.name: Kiss Me Kate
32.description: An ex-husband and wife team star in a musical version of 'The Taming of the Shrew'; off-stage, the production is troublesome with ex-lovers' quarrels and a gangster looking for some money owed to them.

33.name: Glen or Glenda
33.description: A psychiatrist tells two stories: one of a transvestite (Glen or Glenda), the other of a pseudohermaphrodite (Alan or Anne).

34.name: Titanic
34.description: An unhappily married couple struggle to deal with their problems while on board the ill-fated ship.

35.name: Mogambo
35.description: On a Kenyan safari, white hunter Victor Marswell has a love triangle with seductive American socialite Eloise Kelly and anthropologist Donald Nordley's cheating wife Linda.

36.name: Ugetsu monogatari
36.description: A tale of ambition, family, love, and war set in the midst of the Japanese Civil Wars of the sixteenth century.

37.name: The Redhead from Wyoming
37.description: In Wyoming, Sweetwater town sheriff Stan Blaine finds himself in the middle of a range war between greedy cattle barons and newcomer settlers who compete for public lands and unbranded stray cattle.

38.name: I Confess
38.description: A priest, who comes under suspicion for murder, cannot clear his name without breaking the seal of the confessional.

39.name: The Band Wagon
39.description: A pretentiously artistic director is hired for a new Broadway musical and changes it beyond recognition.

40.name: The 5,000 Fingers of Dr. T.
40.description: A young boy travels to an imaginary world where, assisted by his family's plumber, he must save other piano playing kids like himself from the dungeons of his dictatorial piano teacher who also mind-controls his mother.

41.name: House of Blackmail
41.description: A blackmailer is murdered, and the police find that there is a long list of suspects who wanted to see him dead.

42.name: I vitelloni
42.description: A character study of five young men at crucial turning points in their lives in a small town in Italy.

43.name: The Titfield Thunderbolt
43.description: Volunteers take over their local passenger train service (against bus company resistance) when the government announces its closure.

44.name: The Moon Is Blue
44.description: Two aging playboys are both after the same attractive young woman, but she fends them off by claiming that she plans to remain a virgin until her wedding night. Both men determine to find a way around her objections.

45.name: The Naked Spur
45.description: A bounty hunter trying to bring a murderer to justice is forced to accept the help of two less-than-trustworthy strangers.

46.name: Crime Wave
46.description: Reformed parolee Steve Lacey is caught in the middle when a wounded former cellmate seeks him out for shelter.

47.name: Angel Face
47.description: Ambulance driver Frank Jessup is ensnared in the schemes of the sensuous but dangerous Diane Tremayne.

48.name: Devil's Canyon
48.description: In 1897 Arizona, an ex-marshal is sent to the territorial prison where many of his enemies, among guards and inmates alike, are eager for a chance at payback.

49.name: Jigokumon
49.description: A samurai pursues a married lady-in-waiting.

50.name: Scared Stiff
50.description: Fleeing a murder charge, a busboy and a nightclub singer wind up on a spooky Caribbean island inherited by an heiress.
